item.title: About me
item.author: rafiparvez@tamu.edu (Parvez Rafi)
item.description: I am a graduate student at Texas A&M University. I previously worked on digital marketing technnologies for gloabal brands at Publicis.Sapient. I love to develop creative applications and believe that technology with right intent can shape the world constructively. I find the realms of machine/deep learning very fascinating and feels that with constructive usage of artificial intelligence, societies can be transformed in revolutionary ways. With these thoughts in mind, I embarked on a journey to learn and implement ML/DL algorithms.
